column5: LOS ANGELES  Nov 6 The upcoming installment of the "Star Wars" film franchise has finished shooting and will be called "Star Wars: The Force Awakens " Walt Disney Studios said on Thursday.

column4: Walter Investment under regulatory scrutiny for mortgage servicing
column5: NEW YORK Walter Investment Corp   one of the largest U.S. companies that collect home loan payments  said on Thursday that several state regulatory agencies were investigating its business practices  and its shares fell by over 20 percent.
